mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAFE_ORDER_INFO ( ORD_INFO_NO, ORD_TOT_PRICE, REAL_ORD_PRICE, ORD_PAYMENT, ORD_DT_DATE, ORD_STAT, USR_RCV_TIME, RCV_YN, USER_NO, REGNO, REGDATE, ORD_TID ) VALUES ( #{ordInfoNo}, #{ordTotPrice}, #{realOrdPrice}, #{ordPayment}, NOW(), '1', #{usrRcvTime}, #{rcvYn}, #{userNo}, #{userNo}, NOW(), #{ordTid} )
mapper.select: SELECT ORD_INFO_NO, ORD_TOT_PRICE, DATE_FORMAT(ORD_DT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), ORD_STAT FROM CAFE_ORDER_INFO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY ORD_INFO_NO DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT CM.MENU_NAME, CM.MENU_PRICE, COT.ORD_AMNT FROM CAFE_ORDER_INFO COI, CAFE_ORDER_ITEM COT, CAFE_MENU CM WHERE COT.ORD_INFO_NO = COI.ORD_INFO_NO AND COI.ORD_INFO_NO = #{orderNo} AND COT.MENU_NO = CM.MENU_NO

SELECT COI.ORD_INFO_NO AS ordInfoNo, COI.ORD_TOT_PRICE AS ordTotPrice, COI.ORD_PAYMENT AS ordPayment, DATE_FORMAT(COI.ORD_DT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ordDtDate, COI.ORD_STAT AS ordStat, COI.USR_RCV_TIME AS usrRcvTime, COI.RCV_TIME AS rcvTime, COI.RCV_YN AS rcvYn, COI.ORD_CANCEL_YN AS ordCancelYn, COI.ORD_CANCEL_TIME AS ordCancelTime, UC.NAME AS userName, COI.ORD_TID AS ordTid FROM USER_CAFE UC, CAFE_ORDER_INFO COI WHERE COI.ORD_INFO_NO = COI.ORD_INFO_NO AND UC.USER_NO = COI.USER_NO AND COI.ORD_STAT <4

SELECT CM.MENU_NAME AS menuName, CM.MENU_PRICE AS menuPrice, COT.ORD_AMNT AS ordAmnt FROM CAFE_ORDER_INFO COI, CAFE_ORDER_ITEM COT, CAFE_MENU CM WHERE COT.ORD_INFO_NO = COI.ORD_INFO_NO AND COI.ORD_INFO_NO = #{orderNo} AND COT.MENU_NO = CM.MENU_NO

choose.when: UPDATE CAFE_ORDER_INFO SET ORD_STAT = #{statNo} USR_RCV_TIME = NOW() WHERE ORD_INFO_NO = #{ordNo}
UPDATE CAFE_ORDER_INFO SET ORD_STAT = #{statNo}, ORD_CANCEL_YN = 'Y', ORD_CANCEL_TIME = NOW() WHERE ORD_INFO_NO = #{ordNo}

mapper.select: SELECT ORD_INFO_NO FROM CAFE_ORDER_INFO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY REGDATE DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT M.MENU_NAME, O.ORD_AMNT FROM CAFE_ORDER_ITEM O, CAFE_MENE M WHERE O.MENU_NO = M.MENU_NO AND O.ORD_INFO_NO = #{ordInfoNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CAFE_ORDER_INFO SET STAT_NO = 5 WHERE ORD_TID = #{ordTid}
